Pre-Apocalypse: Nothing is known about Cam's life prior to or as the outbreak began.
Post-Apocalypse: At some point in the apocalypse, Cam somehow came into contact with a group named "the Saviors" which he subsequently joined. Cam aided his group in terrorizing other survivors and communities around the area into subjugating to Negan's will, where their victims would be forced to give half their supplies in exchange for not being murdered. Cam is a member of the group of Saviors hunting for Dwight , Sherry , and Tina . While in hiding, Daryl rustles some branches and distracts Cam, causing him to get bitten on the forearm by a walker pinned against the tree. Wade , the party leader, immediately uses a belt for a tourniquet and hacks off Cam's forearm without hesitation. Despite efforts to save his life, Cam succumbed to his injuries and turned before being put down after reanimating.
Death: Killed By Daryl Dixon (Caused, Alive) Zombies (Caused) Wade (Alive) Daryl lured Cam to his hiding spot in the hopes of getting Cam bit, which occurs successfully. Wade then amputates his arm, but Cam succumbed to the wound and reanimates. [1] The Saviors (Zombified) Cam is put down by the Saviors shortly after he reanimates.
Killed Victims: This list shows the victims Cam has killed: Possibly numerous counts of zombies and unnamed people
Trivia: Despite not being seen again after his arm was amputated, Cam's actor (Matt Lowe) confirmed via his Twitter bio that Cam didn't survive and eventually turned.
Name: Cam
